tool_description: King James Version of the Holy Bible. Currently, this api supports random verse generation.
name: KJV Bible
title: KJV Bible

api_list.name: Generate Random Verse
api_list.description: You  an generate a random verse in the bible. Some use case could be daily bible verse generator.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kjv-bible.p.rapidapi.com/randomVerse"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kjv-bible.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://kjv-bible.p.rapidapi.com/randomVerse"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kjv-bible.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
